title: btcnope
author: btcnope
content: WEBSITE | AIRDROP | PRESALE | TWITTER | TELEGRAM | DISCORD

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Yeah, great airdrop  You have to pay almost two hundred million(!) dollars to get a thousand of your tokens in your Airdrop. It's funny. Is that the smartest thing you could think of? Either your token is just a common scam, or there is a mistake in your contract.
